title: Style is the Rocket: and Other Essays on Writing
description: Fantasy writer, essayist and critic Tom Simon looks at some elements of successful and memorable fiction. What makes a story stand out and grab a reader's interest, and how does it happen? What kind of imaginative elements are most likely to have enduring appeal? How important is prose style to a good story? In eleven essays, Simon investigates these and other questions, and his researches lead him to some surprising places.  Like all Bondwine books, this title is sold without DRM.
author: Tom Simon
